item.title: Why Ariana Grande opting out of dynamic pricing might actually help ticket scalpers — and not her fans
item.description: Though consumers often assume they lose out with dynamic pricing, experts say that’s not always the case.

item.title: Taylor Swift tries to save the movie industry again with ‘Showgirl’ film release
item.description: “Taylor Swift: The Official Release Party of a Showgirl” will hit theaters on Oct. 3, the same day her upcoming album drops.

item.title: Trump touts TikTok deal but doesn’t address fear that China ‘retains a veto’
item.description: Here’s the latest on the Trump administration’s agreement with China on TikTok.

item.title: Stocks tend to suffer in the second half of September — but the Fed’s rate cut might keep bears at bay
item.description: History suggests it could be a downhill ride for stocks through the end of September.

item.title: Is the revamped American Express Platinum card worth the $895 fee? This new perk may seal the deal.
item.description: American Express is seeking to address longstanding customer complaints that it is difficult to track statement credits.
